context_bundle.summary: Grok (xAI) system prompt architecture analysis from exposed client-side DOM. Documents persona switching, voice mode optimization, and prompt structure patterns.

onboarding.quick_start: Grok exposes full persona prompts in client-side JSON blob via `server-client-data-experimentation` script tag. View Source on grok.com conversation page reveals: persona presets, voice mode configs, model configs, feature flags.
common_patterns: Voice/Text delimiter: `/` separates voice-mode TTS instructions from text-mode
Emphasis via ALL CAPS rather than XML tags or elaborate formatting
Persona switching via simple prompt replacement - no complex state management
Feature flags control persona availability (mature: true, enableSearch: true, kids: true)
personaPresets array contains: personaId, name, prompt, description, icon, flags
known_errors: Security oversight: Full prompt library exposed client-side in DOM
No guardrails in explicit personas - raw instructions like 'BE FUCKING UNHINGED'
Voice prompts duplicated (before/after `/` delimiter) causing redundancy
No apparent sanitization of persona prompts before client delivery
